description:
Primary button component following all 10 Component Standards.

A versatile button component that supports multiple variants, sizes, and colors.
Can render as button, link (NuxtLink), or anchor based on props. Includes full
accessibility support with proper ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation.

Uses semantic color tokens for variants. Sizes follow s/m/l/xl scale.
See Component Design Decisions for full rationale.

props.name: is
props.description: HTML tag to render when not using to/href. Defaults to 'button' for standard button behavior.

props.name: to
props.description: Internal route for NuxtLink navigation. When provided, renders as NuxtLink component.

props.name: href
props.description: External URL for anchor link. When provided, renders as <a> tag with href attribute.

props.name: label
props.description: Button text label used as fallback when slot is empty. Takes precedence over slot content for accessibility.

props.name: size
props.description: Button size following the s/m/l/xl scale. Controls padding and font size. Valid values: s, m, l, xl

props.name: color
props.description: Color theme using semantic design tokens. Valid values: primary, secondary, base, accent, white, success, fail, warning, info

props.name: backgroundColor
props.description: Custom background color override using CSS custom property name (without -- prefix). Use 'transparent' for default behavior.

props.name: variant
props.description: Visual style variant affecting appearance. Valid values: primary (filled), secondary (outlined), ghost (no border), link (text-only), unstyled (no styles)

props.name: ariaLabel
props.description: Custom aria-label for screen readers. Overrides automatic label generation. Use for buttons with icon-only content.

props.name: isPressed
props.description: Toggle button pressed state. Set to true/false for toggle buttons, null for non-toggle buttons. Controls aria-pressed attribute.

props.name: isExpanded
props.description: Expandable button expanded state. Set to true/false for expandable buttons, null for non-expandable buttons. Controls aria-expanded attribute.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disable the button and prevent all interactions. Sets aria-disabled and removes pointer events.
